Class RoleResource

    Class enabling Clients to perform operations on Roles.

    • Method Detail

      • getRole

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getRole(String rolename,
                                @HeaderParam(value="username")
                                String username)
        This method returns a requested role.
        Parameters:
        rolename - indicates which role is looked for
        username - the user requesting the service
        Returns:
        the requested role
        Throws:
        RoleNotExistentException

      • getAllRoles

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAllRoles(@HeaderParam(value="username")
                                    String username)
        This Method grants the Clients access to all Roles stored in persistence.
        Parameters:
        username - the user requesting the service
        Returns:
        All Roles in the persistence as string if successful, 500 Server Error if not

      • saveRole

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response saveRole(javax.ws.rs.core.MultivaluedMap<String,String> formParams,
                                 @HeaderParam(value="username")
                                 String username)
        This Method enables Clients to save Roles into the persistence.
        Parameters:
        username - the user requesting the service
        formParams - the role to be saved is available via key "data"
        Returns:
        200 OK if successful, 500 Server Error if not

      • updateRole

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateRole(String rolename,
                                   javax.ws.rs.core.MultivaluedMap<String,String> formParams,
                                   @HeaderParam(value="username")
                                   String username)
        This Method enables Clients to update existing Roles.
        Parameters:
        rolename - the name of the Role to be updated
        username - the user requesting the service
        formParams - the key "data" holds the instance of Role to be saved
        Returns:
        200 OK if successful, 500 Server Error if not

      • deleteRole

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteRole(String rolename,
                                   @HeaderParam(value="username")
                                   String username)
        This method enables Clients to delete Roles from the persistence.
        Parameters:
        rolename - the name of the role to be deleted
        username - is the logged in user
        Returns:
        200 OK if successful, 500 ServerError if not
